about.intro: I'm Ricardo Camilo, a frontend developer focused on creating solutions that deliver real results for your business. üöÄ
about.description: As an analytical and methodical developer, I have already helped several companies increase their conversions through optimized interfaces. My solutions have achieved performance improvements of up to 40%, resulting in greater user engagement and satisfaction. ‚ú®
about.education: Graduated in Information Technology Management from FATEC, with a specialization in modern frontend development. Proficient in Vue.js and React.js, having implemented robust solutions for fintechs and investment platforms. Available for immediate start. üíª
about.hobbies: When I'm not coding, you can find me immersed in Chinese novels, manga, or with my five cats, seeking inspiration to bring even more creativity to my projects. üìöüê±
about.bruceQuote: "Do not get set into one form, adapt it and build your own, and let it grow, be like water. Empty your mind, be formless, shapeless ‚Äî like water. Now you put water in a cup, it becomes the cup; You put water into a bottle it becomes the bottle; You put it in a teapot it becomes the teapot. Now water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend." - Bruce Lee üåä

bitOfMe.reading: I am an avid reader of Chinese novels and manga, diving into fantastic worlds that expand my creativity.
bitOfMe.movies: Passionate about science fiction, I find inspiration for innovation through movies and series that explore the limits of technology and imagination.
bitOfMe.cats: I have five cats: Hercules, Johan, Lady, Princesa, and Aladin. Each with their unique personality, bringing joy and companionship to my daily life.
bitOfMe.programming: As a developer, I find in programming a way to create digital experiences as fascinating as the stories I read.
bitOfMe.relaxing: In my spare time, I enjoy relaxing with my cats, a good Chinese novel, and a cup of coffee, balancing the technical world with moments of tranquility.
bitOfMe.gaming: An appreciator of well-constructed narratives, whether in books, manga, or games, always seeking stories that inspire me both personally and professionally.

journey.title: How I can help your business
journey.description: Specialist in turning complex challenges into solutions that deliver results. My experience in fintech and investment platforms allows me to deeply understand your business needs and deliver interfaces that truly work.
journey.approach: My commitment to results translates into real numbers: sites up to 40% faster, development processes 60% more efficient, and interfaces that your users truly love to use.

funFact.label: Availability:
funFact.description: I am available for an immediate start and seek an opportunity to add value with my technical skills and commitment to excellence. Currently expanding knowledge in Node.js for full-stack development.

journey.conclusion: I believe the true value of a developer lies not only in the code I write but in the ability to become elegant and easy to maintain.

work.title: Results I deliver
work.description: Discover some real cases of how I have been helping companies achieve their goals through efficient technical solutions.

breathNatural.name: ü™¥ Breath Natural - NextJS
breathNatural.description: My first immersion in the NextJS universe! I developed this plant e-commerce with a focus on sustainability, turning a minimalist design into an engaging and modern shopping experience. Even though it was my first project with NextJS, I managed to implement advanced features like SSR (Server-Side Rendering), automatic image optimization, and dynamic routes. The result is an application with exceptional performance, achieving 90+ on Lighthouse, with smooth animations and a premium user experience. This project demonstrates my ability to quickly master new technologies and deliver professional results even during the learning curve.

foodHut.name: üçΩÔ∏è Food Hut - AngularJS
foodHut.description: My journey of discovery in the Angular ecosystem! This food ordering system represents my first dive into the framework, where I turned challenges into learning opportunities. I implemented robust features like a dynamic shopping cart, real-time search system, and state management with Services. Even though it was my first experience with Angular, the project demonstrates mastery of fundamental concepts like Dependency Injection, Observables, and Component Lifecycle. The result is a professional application that not only works perfectly but also demonstrates my ability to adapt and evolve quickly in new technologies.

testimonials.title: What I can do for your project

testimonial1.name: Ricardo Camilo
testimonial1.testimonial: Is your website slow? I can help improve your users' experience with optimizations that have already reduced loading times by 40% in other projects. I implement detailed analyses to make data-driven decisions, resulting in more conversions for your business.

testimonial2.name: Ricardo Camilo
testimonial2.testimonial: Need to modernize your system without breaking what already works? With experience in Vue.js and React.js, I can bring your project to the latest technologies while keeping everything running smoothly. Specialized in e-commerce, I can help increase your sales with conversion-focused optimizations.

testimonial3.name: Ricardo Camilo
testimonial3.testimonial: Looking for a customized solution for managing your business? I can create intuitive administrative dashboards that make your daily life easier. With a focus on usability and efficiency, I develop interfaces that your employees will love to use.
